dialog.text: I see a science class through the window! There's a plant on the windowsill.*Should I open the window?
Ahh, sunlight! I never get enough of it through the glass!*So, um, is this your first day at the school?

options.option: Yeah, it is... How did you know?

dialog.text: Well... Usually no-one opens the window. There was an incident with the science teacher and this window.
Yeah. But I saw it all! He didn't do anything wrong!*It was just a lazy student spreading rumors because she didn't like science...
Yeah, it's super unfair! He's really nice! And science is super fun!*But I think people find him hard to approach. Still, no-one even asked me altough I was there all through it!

options.option: I would definitely have asked you!

You ARE a plant after all.

dialog.text: Really? Although I'm just a clumsy geeky plant! Thank you!

options.option: Glad to see you're feeling better!
